subject: Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: In many ways, the vast park caters avidly to the West, and the United States in particular. But behind the familiar trappings, many aspects of the Games are distinctly Russian.
snippet: In many ways, the vast park caters avidly to the West, and the United States in particular. But behind the familiar trappings, many aspects of the Games are distinctly Russian.
